name: Winter templates pack
description:
Original VCMI default templates with winter scenery.

To play these winter templates, you need to enable the following mods:
1. New terrains pack (created by: Ben Yan, zeryss)
2. Towns new views (created by: Zachari, J.M.Sower, Trith, Toffi, macron1, avatar)
author: luk3Z
